comments:
Smoke: Report can not be previewed as html and pdf.

Steps:
1.Create a new report
2.Create a parameter into the layout
3.Preview as html and pdf

Actual Results:
1.Preview as html:  
   System throws exception:
   soapenv:Server.userException 
   java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "Error-value" 
2.Preview as PDF
     HTTP Status 500 - 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

type Exception report

message 

description The server encountered an internal error () that prevented it from fulfilling this request.


Expected Results:
1.Report can be previewed as html and pdf correctly.

I assume we used dec 5th build. The required jars are missing.

prototype.js,
axis.jar,
axis-any.jar,
common.jar
common.resource.jar
commons-discovery.jar
commons-logging.jar
jaxrpc.jar
log4j-1.2.8.jar
saaj.jar
wsdl4j.jar
xerces.jar

are missing. They should be included in both deigner build and viewer war file.

After manually copy those jars and js file into the right place, preview again. See exceptions:

----- Root Cause -----
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/eclipse/birt/report/engine/api/script/IReportContext

The required jars are 3rd party libraries. Since they are not approved, we can't  included them.
temporarily copy the jars and js file until these libs are approved.
We added these jars and js file to viewer plug-in before testing build 20051205, so it seems that this issue was not caused by missing 3rd jars.
